title: prEma svarUpa sarasa lOcana
sahitya:
prEma svarUpa sarasa lOcana priyakara mrdu vacana rAsa rasa rasana


anupallavi

  shyAmaLa mrdula sharIra manOhara 
sajala jalada sama sadaya hrdaya vraja taruNijana mana mOhanakara (ati)


caraNam    ga ri ga ma pA ma ga ma pA ma ga ri ga mA pa mA pa mA pa ma ga ri ga (x3)
lalita cikura mAyUra makuTadhara nava nava vanavidha mAlAdharayita
khalita smita shObha kamala nayana taruNAdhara muraLIdhara karuNAkara
